card_name: Hieratic Sky Dragon Overlord of Heliopolis
card_text: 2 Level 8 monsters$NOnce per turn, when your opponent activates a card or effect that targets a card(s) on your field, your GY, and/or your banished card(s) (Quick Effect): You can detach 1 material from this card; negate the activation, and if you do, destroy that card.
